I bought this purse in mauve/dusty pink. When it arrived it was smaller than expected, but HOLY CANNOLI! 🤯 Everything from my much larger purse fit into this one! It has multiple little zippered compartments within, (which is great because I *love* an organized purse!), and it has a hard ‘skeleton’-type structure, meaning if you set it down on it’s bottom it stays put and doesn’t flop over. I can’t tell you how much I love it; even my 24-yr old daughter said, “Where did you get this cute purse?!?” I’m most likely going to order 1-2 more in varying colors. 5-stars! 🎉

评论概述: TINY PURSE HOLDS QUITE A BIT!
评论详情: This is a cute little purse... the smallest I have ever owned.  Wasn't sure it would be large enough until I opened the top:  The purse has a jaw, making it possible to get lots of stuff in and find stuff quickly.  The only reason I'm giving it a 4 instead of a 5 is because that jaw requires you to close and secure the flap every time you grab the bag.  If you don't, the purse opens up.  And if you are not used to doing that, it can seem anoying.

All in all it's a cute unique purse.

Closed correctly it would be difficult for a pick pocket to get inside. Really enjoying this item.

Pockets are Made with thin plastic on inside. Easily torn. Zippers are cheap made, split open if to full.I do like the wide open space then you get into it. Very roomy.
